name: The Lost Scroll
description:
Help the whitebeard to find the lost scroll in the dungeon!

Hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!

How to play

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • The water turns your torch off
  • Pay attention to some ground tiles
  • Do not touch the Axe's edge
    Be careful, there's a lot of danger

This game was made by johnperes for the with the DevAtlas Jam 2 theme "One light source".
